set.name: DM25-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Skill

property.name: Type
property.value: Tamaseed / Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale/ACE

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this tamaseed, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures or tamaseeds that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy it. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Skill

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your Abyss creatures in your graveyard get "Abyss Rush". (You may summon a creature that has "Abyss Rush" from your graveyard. If you do, that creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead. ■ Your creatures in your graveyard cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Over Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Skill

property.name: Type
property.value: Tamaseed / Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Dragon/ACE

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this tamaseed or whenever one of your Abyss attacks, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. ■ Whenever your Abyss would leave, you may choose 4 cards from your graveyard, shuffle them, and put them on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Over Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Skill

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a creature from it. ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, you may choose a card in your opponent's graveyard. You may use one of that card's "when you put" abilities. Then your opponent puts that card on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, do the following ability twice. ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) TWINPACT ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard. ■ During your opponent's turn, when you put this creature, if 2 or more of your shields weren't broken this turn, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then add one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Skill

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ 'Civil Count 2': If this spell is in your shield zone and you have a total of 2 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this spell gets "shield trigger". ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put an Abyss that costs 4 or less from your graveyard.

Then choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy it.
